titleStmt.title: A newe booke called the shippe of safegard, wrytten by G.B. Anno. 1569
Shippe of safegard.
titleStmt.author: Googe, Barnabe, 1540-1594.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The ship of safegard.
Includes "The death of S. Polycarpus" and "A priest of Apollo straungely conuerted".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
